attributes.action: Start a National good Karma week
attributes.background: Treat others the way that you would want to be treated and Karma go hand in hand. Hurt, harm, bully, offend and do wrong to others this includes animals and karma will come back on you. its as simple as that. a good Karma week would help people learn about Karma and change with out losing face.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do in relation to a national "good Karma week". You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you want the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could start a petition calling for the Government to support a national day by funding activities to raise awareness of the issues you're concerned about.
